Public Function AddFont (obfuscate As Boolean) As XpsFont

param.name: obfuscate
param.span: 如果要对字体进行模糊处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to obfuscate the font; otherwise, .

summary.span: 将一个经过模糊处理的新 添加到当前页中。

span.span: Adds a new obfuscated to the current page.
The new font resource that was added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 带有可选模糊处理的新添加到文档包，并将其与当前的关联 。 adds a new with optional obfuscation to the document package and associates it with the current . `obfuscate` `true` 如果你有权模糊处理许可的专有字体，请将参数设置为。Set the `obfuscate` parameter to `true` when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font. 尽管模糊处理不会加密字体，但会禁止解压缩专用字体并为其他用途单独安装它们。While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses. 有关字体模糊处理的详细信息，请参阅 *XML 纸张规格 (XPS)* 中的 "嵌入字体模糊" 部分，可供下载 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 。For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法将字体资源添加到页面。The following example shows how to use the method in order to add a font resource to a page. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

span.span: has been called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向 文档包添加可选模糊处理或限制的新，并将其与当前的关联 。 adds a new with optional obfuscation or restrictions to the document package, and associates it with the current . `obfuscate` `true` 如果你有权模糊处理许可的专有字体，请将参数设置为。Set the `obfuscate` parameter to `true` when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font. 尽管模糊处理不会加密字体，但会禁止解压缩专用字体并为其他用途单独安装它们。While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses. 有关字体模糊处理和使用受限字体的详细信息，请参阅 *XML 纸张规范 (XPS)* 可从下载 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 。For more information about font obfuscation and the use of restricted fonts see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法将字体资源添加到页面。The following example shows how to use the method to add a font resource to a page. span.span: A list of strings that identify the hyperlink points that are contained in the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 编写页面并调用方法之后，超链接点列表可用 。The list of hyperlink points is available after the page has been written and the method has been called. 有关元素的详细信息， 请参阅 \ XML 纸张规格中的 3.2.3 "元素" 部分 *(XPS)* 可供下载 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 。For information about elements see Section 3.2.3 "\ Element" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
